securityCompliance.title: Security & Access Control
securityCompliance.impact: Server-enforced RBAC with comprehensive role management and audit trails
securityCompliance.valuePlaceholder: Security compliance value calculation needed - recommend tracking: audit cost savings × compliance risk reduction

marketExpansion.title: Global Market Access
marketExpansion.impact: End-to-end multilingual content with professional medical translation
marketExpansion.valuePlaceholder: Market expansion value calculation needed - recommend tracking: potential user acquisition × average revenue per user

operationalExcellence.title: DevOps & Infrastructure Modernization
operationalExcellence.impact: Docker containerization with automated CI/CD and environment parity
operationalExcellence.valuePlaceholder: Operational efficiency value calculation needed - recommend tracking: deployment time saved × developer productivity

technicalModernization.title: Platform Modernization
technicalModernization.impact: Technical debt reduction with modern patterns and improved developer productivity
technicalModernization.valuePlaceholder: Technical debt reduction value calculation needed - recommend tracking: maintenance cost reduction × development velocity increase

insights.criticalBlockers: All 38 items in To Do status - sprint planning or execution issues
insights.velocityGap: 0 pts/day vs 3.2 target (100% gap - immediate intervention required)
insights.valueTracking: Sprint represents $266,570 potential value but requires immediate execution focus

Roles, Personas & Feature Gating.businessValue: Server-enforced RBAC with comprehensive role management

prdDetails.vision: Define org-level roles and personas; gate features & Admin with roles
prdDetails.businessImpact: Enhanced security, personalized UX, regulatory compliance, streamlined workflows

Multilanguage Enablement.businessValue: End-to-end multilingual content with Spanish, French & Chinese support

prdDetails.vision: End-to-end multilingual content: DB schema, APIs, Admin editing, rendering
prdDetails.businessImpact: Market expansion to Spanish/French/Chinese markets, improved accessibility, competitive advantage

Mobile Parity & Infrastructure.businessValue: iOS backend integration and Android development initiation

prdDetails.vision: Keep mobile in sync with platform changes (esp. multilingual) and ensure necessary infra
prdDetails.businessImpact: Consistent cross-platform experience, expanded user base, mobile-first healthcare applications

DevOps & Deploy Modernization.businessValue: Docker containerization with automated CI/CD and environment parity

prdDetails.vision: Keep Front Door for now; move backend to Docker; fix deployment structure; enable slot deployments
prdDetails.businessImpact: Reproducible builds, faster deployment cycles, reduced downtime, better testing environments

Database Migrations via ORM.businessValue: Automated migration workflow with forward/backward compatibility

prdDetails.vision: Introduce migration workflow so DB changes ship with code
prdDetails.businessImpact: Consistent database schema, automated rollback capabilities, reduced manual database management

Admin Consolidation.businessValue: Unified application with role-based admin access

prdDetails.vision: Fold Admin into the main app behind role-based routes; remove duplicate Admin-only APIs
prdDetails.businessImpact: Operational efficiency, cost reduction, unified interface, centralized security

Architecture: V3 ➜ V4 In‑Place Rebuild.businessValue: TypeScript migration with modern patterns and zero downtime

prdDetails.vision: Incrementally rebuild the existing front-end and APIs in place (migrate legacy JSX to TypeScript)
prdDetails.businessImpact: Technical debt reduction, improved developer productivity, better maintainability, enhanced performance

Bugs Reported-25Q309.businessValue: Critical clinical workflow stability and user experience fixes

prdDetails.vision: Address critical bugs affecting clinical workflows and user experience
prdDetails.businessImpact: Enhanced clinical workflow stability, improved user experience, reduced support burden
